title: A Casual Meeting
introduction: This lesson presents a casual interaction between two individuals meeting for the first time. They greet each other, exchange pleasantries about their well-being, and share brief plans for their day.

story.speaker: speaker1
story.message: También estoy bien. ¿Qué planes tienes para hoy?
story.translation: I'm also good. What plans do you have for today?

story.speaker: speaker2
story.message: Voy a trabajar hasta el mediodía y luego iré al gimnasio. ¿Y tú?
story.translation: I'm going to work until noon and then I'll go to the gym. What about you?

story.speaker: speaker1
story.message: Yo tengo clases toda la tarde, pero después planeo ver una película.
story.translation: I have classes all afternoon, but afterwards, I plan to watch a movie.

story.speaker: speaker2
story.message: Suena como un buen plan. Disfruta tu día.
story.translation: Sounds like a good plan. Enjoy your day.
